configuration.title: INI IntelliSense
configuration.properties.exePath.descrip: Absolute path to INIValidator.exe. It's recommended to set this via the status bar icon or the 'Manage INI Validator' command.
configuration.properties.validationFolde: Absolute path to the root directory of the Mod to be validated. It's recommended to set this via the setup guide or the status bar icon.
configuration.properties.validationFiles: List of files to be validated. It's recommended to edit this interactively via the status bar icon or the 'Manage INI Validator' command.
configuration.properties.indexing.includ: An array of Glob patterns specifying which INI files should be indexed by the extension. Only files matching at least one pattern in this list will be processed. Example: ['maps/**/*.ini'] to index all ini files under maps subdirectories.
configuration.properties.indexing.exclud: An array of Glob patterns to exclude specific files or directories from the included files. Example: ['**/*_backup.ini'].
configuration.properties.dontAskToConfig: If true, the extension will not ask you to configure INI Validator on startup.
If true, the extension will not ask you to configure the Mod project root directory on startup.
Absolute path to the INI Dictionary file (INIDictionary.ini). If not set, rule-based IntelliSense and diagnostics will be disabled.
configuration.properties.codeLens.enable: Whether to show CodeLens above sections to display their reference counts.
configuration.properties.decorations.ove: Enable or disable the inheritance override indicator (icon next to the line number and italic key name).
configuration.properties.diagnostics.ena: Enable or disable all built-in diagnostic checks.
configuration.properties.diagnostics.dis: A list of specific error codes to disable (e.g., ["STYLE-101", "TYPE-201"]).
configuration.properties.diagnostics.spa: Whether to check and warn about extra spaces to the left of the equals sign (=).
Whether to check and warn about extra spaces to the right of the equals sign (=).
configuration.properties.diagnostics.lea: Whether to check and warn about extra whitespace at the beginning of a line.
configuration.properties.diagnostics.spa: The exact number of spaces that should precede a comment character (;). Set to null or leave empty to disable this check.
Whether to check and warn about missing space after the comment character (;) (e.g., ';comment' instead of '; comment').
